featured.text: So, an 8-year-old who passes the 10-year-old’s test would have an IQ of 10/8 times 100, or 125.
From Binet’s work, the phrase “intelligence quotient” (“IQ”) entered the English vocabulary.
The IQ is the ratio of “mental age” to chronological age times 100, with 100 30 the average.
But don’t expect it to measure your pet’s IQ.

definition.zh_def: 智商，智力商數的縮寫，用來測量一個人的智力水平。
definition.en_def: IQ, short for Intelligence Quotient, is a measure of a person's intellectual abilities in relation to others.
definition.example: She scored high on her IQ test, indicating strong problem-solving skills.
